page.title: 11 THE POST-OFFICE - WEST ROW
page.content: THE SUB POST-OFFICE IN WEST ROW IS OFTEN A BUSY PLACE FOR HERE THE VILLAGERS CAN GET THEIR PENSIONS, FAMILY ALLOWANCES,POSTAL ORDERS, DOG LICENCES, T.V.LICENCES AND MUCH MORE. HOWEVER, CUSTOMERS WISHING TO TAX THEIR CARS HAVE TO GO TO BECK ROW OR MILDENHALL, A SITUATION THE POSTMASTER HOPES WILL SOON BE PUT RIGHT. THE POST-OFFICE IS ONLY ONE SECTION OF THIS VILLAGE SHOP. IT ALSO SELLS MANY GROCERY ITEMS,AS WELL AS SWEETS, CARDS,PENCILS,MINERALS AND SAUSAGES! SHOULD YOU WANT YOUR HAIR DONE THE POST-MASTER AND HIS WIFE ALSO OWN THE HAIRDRESSER'S SHOP NEXT DOOR. DELIVERING THE ROYAL MAIL HERE IS A JOB FOR A LOCAL POSTMAN PAT FOR HE MUST KNOW ALL THE INTRICACIES OF WINDING VILLAGE ROADS, UNMAMED DROVES AND ISOLATED FARMHOUSES.
